original: intros. in_crush. find_copy_apply_lem_hyp lock_invariant_holds. unfold lock_invariant_holds in *. intuition. match goal with | H : forall _ _, _ |- In Unlock (?p :: ?l) => specialize (H p.(pSrc) c); intros; specialize (H (conj (refl_equal _) H1)) end. break_exists. intuition. match goal with H : context [In _ ?l] |- _ => assert (In (Unlock, (c, x)) l) by (rewrite <- H; simpl; auto) end. unfold occurred in *. break_exists_exists. intuition. eapply next_later; eauto. intros. simpl in *. find_apply_hyp_hyp. intuition.
